Filto: Video & Photo Editor

Brief:

Begin a journey of visual enchantment with Filto, the app that infuses your photos and videos with a touch of aesthetic brilliance. With an array of creative filters, effects, and editing tools, this app is your passport to crafting stunning, share-worthy media. Whether you're reminiscing in retro vibes or sparkling like a superstar, Filto elevates your digital content to artwork.
